§n§acs.CG§r, §acs.DM§r§r
§6§lPolygonal Chains Cannot Lock in 4D§r

§8§oRoxana Cocan
Joseph O'Rourke§r

§72001§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oMajor revision of the Aug. 1999 version, including:Proof extended to showtrees cannot lock in 4D; new example of the implementation straightening a chain ofn=100 vertices; improved time complexity for chain to O(n^2);
fixed several minor technical errors. (Thanks to three referees.) 29 pages; 15figures. v3: Reference updated\u00a7r
